page.title: 12ENTERTAINMENT.
page.content: Entertainment in Hexham is very good because there is a big place called the Queens hall.It shows lots of films and plays.It also has a library and a cafe.You can go and make things at Easter time there is an exhibition as well.Every year we have a festival called the Tynedale festival for people who want to sing.I liked listening to the Tynedale festival because the standards are high.Twice a year there is a fair.One fair is small but another is massive.One of the rides is called Octopus which goes very fast.It comes in July.There is a cinama which has a bingo hall and a bar.There is a nightclub called Turnbulls where you can go Disco Dancing they have flashey lights as well.
